author: Timothy Rapp
title: Dabo Swinney Has 'Zero Doubt' CFB Season Starts on Time Despite COVID-19
description: Clemson head football coach Dabo Swinney is very confident that the 2020 season will start on time in the fall, despite the uncertainties in all major sports due to the COVID-19 pandemic,...
content:
Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images
